ComicInfo.Title: Snake in the Grass Part Six
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
COBRA prepares for its next strike against G.I. JOE, and this time, the Real American Heroes won't see it coming!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | S.L. Gallant (a) & J. Brown (c) | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | John Royale (a), Jagdish Kumar (a) & John Rauch (c) | 2 | Note: The digital edition (12/28/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
